scenario: Shares of Lucid Group (LCID) are rising 7.9% at 11:15 a.m. ET, contributing to a 51% increase over the last month. The electric vehicle (EV) maker's peers, Tesla and Rivian Automotive, have reported fourth-quarter delivery figures that indicate consumer demand remains healthy. Both companies showed higher fourth-quarter vehicle deliveries than production levels, resulting in declining inventory. Tesla reduced its vehicle inventory by 36,000 units in the fourth quarter, while Rivian reduced its inventory by 1,500 EVs. This bodes well for upcoming financial results, particularly for Lucid, which is expected to release its fourth-quarter production and delivery figures next week.
